name: Violetta
description:
You are captured by a lonely gynoid who wants human companionship again.  She wants to help you keep your mind sharp by playing a game.  But why does she look so familiar?

  • Befriend a melancholy robot lady
  • Play a number-guessing game
  • Replayability: play as many or as few times as you like!
  • Background by Andy Art of unsplash.com
  • Sprite by charactercreator.org
  • Music ("Mystery Palace") by Alexander Nakarada
